formulas.name: default_UsiaPemohon
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) , NULL , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) , DAY( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (TODAY()) - YEAR ( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}), YEAR (TODAY()) - YEAR ( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) -1 ) )

formulas.name: formulaBirthdayForLoanInput
formulas.expression: RIGHT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4) & "-" & IF(VALUE(MID(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4, 2)) < 10, "0" & TEXT(VALUE(MID(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4, 2))), TEXT(VALUE(MID(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4, 2)))) & "-" & IF(VALUE(LEFT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 2)) < 10, "0" & TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 2))), TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 2))))
